edu.stockton
Class InstructionEngine

java.lang.Object
  edu.stockton.InstructionEngine

public class InstructionEngine
extends java.lang.Object

Recognizes valid ATC commands by checking strings against instructions XML data library. Identifies instruction parameters and returns a ParsedInstruction object containing interpreted instruction components (instruction phrase, param output, type).

Constructor Detail

InstructionEngine

public InstructionEngine()
Method Detail

init

public static void init()
Loads the instruction library into the static hash table. The engine doesn't need to be explicitly initialized, each method does a check for initialization before proceeding.

parse

public static ParsedInstruction parse(java.lang.String phrase)
Identifies an instruction in a passed string sentence.

Parameters:
phrase - The phrase to identify
Returns:
A ParsedInstruction object of the identified instruction

isInstruction

public static int isInstruction(java.lang.String phrase)
Checks a phrase against the instruction xml library. If the passed phrase is a valid instruction, it returns the index of the phrase in the library. Otherwise, it returns -1.

Parameters:
phrase - The phrase to check.
Returns:
Index value in the instructions ArrayList of the InstructionEngine class.

setDebug

public static void setDebug(boolean s)
Sets debug option, which prints low-level process details

Parameters:
s - true or false to set on/off
